title: MTS 3 Cohesity Offer vs Samsung R & D Lead Engineer Offer
content:
Education: Mtech 
Years of Experience: 3 YOE
Current : 23LPA + 14 RSU = 37 LPA


Date of the Offer: July 2024
Company: Cohesity
Title/Level: MTS-3
Location: Bangalore
Salary: Base 35 LPA + 2 PF + 2.5 Variable = 39.5
Stock bonus: 3450 Unit USD (Over 3 years ) : 29 Lakh per year if IPO comes at 30$ price.

Stock bonus: 0;
Joining Bonus 3.7 for first year and 3.7 for second year.
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 43 LPA First and second year . 

Which is better based on above, just note hectic work culture in cohesity and IPO not listed yet.
